Description:
Detects when an access level is changed for a Google workspace application.
An access level is part of BeyondCorp Enterprise which is Google Workspace's way of enforcing Zero Trust model.
An adversary would be able to remove access levels to gain easier access to Google workspace resources.


Author: Bryan Lim
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Google Workspace Application Access Level Modified
Query: sourcetype='gcp-google_workspace.admin' eql select * from _source_ where eventservice = 'admin.googleapis.com' and eventname = 'change_application_setting' and setting_name like 'contextawareaccess%'
